name: Verify Fix for DEF-001: NullReferenceException on Suit Interaction
description: Verifies that pressing [G] while interacting with the suit does not trigger a NullReferenceException.
testObjective: Confirm that the defect is fixed and the player remains in normal view without errors.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Launch the game through Steam Client.
Wait for intro video to finish.
Approach and interact with the suit embedded in the wall.
Press the 'G' key while interacting with the suit.
steps.expected: Pressing 'G' does nothing; no errors occur and the player remains in normal view.
